name: Minglies
description:
The Minglies are an odd looking bunch. But don't hold that against them; their first iPad app comes with 3 fun pastimes to keep the little ones amused...

- Memory game (match the Mingly pairs)
- Dial-a-Mingly (mix feature combinations)
- Sliding puzzles (can you get all the tiles in the right place)?

Use these characters as inspiration for your next drawing session with your child. Can you create a Mingly? What color is she? What shape is her head? How many eyes, legs, noses does she have?
